about_the_game:
You have the right to remain silent… unless this agent commands otherwise.

Welcome to Interrogation in Progress, the new DLC for Fetish Club that brings authority and power dynamics to the next level. Step into a high-stakes interrogation where the roles of power are deliciously blurred.

This DLC introduces:

  • Swatie – A commanding SWAT agent who takes control of every situation.

  • Inmate – A prisoner with secrets... and no escape from Swatie’s relentless interrogation.

  • New Environment: Interrogation Room – Every corner of this room is designed for interrogation in progress, but not the kind you see on TV.

  • Enjoy 8+ exclusive FemDom poses meticulously crafted to immerse you in the tension, submission, and power play. Including Face Sitting, Ass Licking and Feet Licking... Can you handle Swatie’s methods, or will you break under the pressure?

The interrogation is about to begin. Remember, in Fetish Club, silence isn’t always an option. Do you dare to submit?

Additionally, this game doesn't feature :

- Self-hurt, suicide, hate of any kind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Quest, Rift, Vive and Index are supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: Quest, Rift, Vive and Index are supported

short_description: "You have the right to remain silent… or not." Interrogation Room is a DLC for Fetish Club featuring two new characters, Swatie and Inmate, a new environment, and over 8 FemDom poses. Swatie takes control, and this interrogation goes far beyond mere questions. Are you ready to submit?
